descriptionHtml:
This is a RaceMenu Preset of my sorrowful Redguard, called Savsaaba.
Maybe...just maybe there is someone out there, who likes this.

[b]Mods I use for him:[/b]

Body: [url=https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/498-sos-schlongs-of-skyrim/]SoS [/url] with [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145]Smooth Body Textures for Better Males and SoS[/url]
Face: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures for Men[/url]

Hair: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdo's - Renewal[/url] -> for the white haircolor I added this mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88254]Smooth Silky Straight KS Hairdo's Retexture[/url]
Brows: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411]Brows[/url]
Eyes: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12307]Spectral Shades - Eyes[/url]


[b]Armors I used for the screenshots:[/b] (pics from left to right)

Scoundrel's Armor remastered (RefurbMadness)
Thieves Guild Armor (RefurbMadness)
Revealing Tsun's armor for Sundracon Males (seedye)
Moonlight Assassin Armor from Simple Outfits for Men (RefurbMadness)

Follower version is now available (separate mod).


Hope you like him! :)
author: Thrwomp
